name: Fruit Frozen Frenzy
description:
Play Fruit Frozen Frenzy , a delightfully fun "Match 3" fruit slicing game. Connect colorful, animated fruits and make them explode to score as many points as you can before time runs out. Go fast enough and you will enter Frenzy Mode for super high scores and exciting action!

TAP, BLAST & COLLECT THE FRUITS!

The ultimate matching puzzle game with unique gameplay! It's Fruit Frozen Frenzy time!

Match two or more fruits of the same color to clear the level and collect the stuck fruits. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the fruits while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. No more crushing candies, breaking diamonds, crunching cookies or farming. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!

Features:

● Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
● So many levels with exciting puzzles
● Spectacular rewards and extra bonuses unlocked after levels passed
● Easy and fun to play but challenging to master

Enjoy never ending fun in Fruit Frozen Frenzy!
